Container.Name: machinaris-chives
Container.Overview: Adds on farming of the Chives blockchain to the main Machinaris application.
Container.Description: Pre-requisite: Machinaris controller, containing Chia blockchain, which this Chives container will register with. After first-launch of this Chives container, be sure to place your /mnt/user/appdata/machinaris-chives/mnemonic.txt file in place and restart. Be sure to set the LAN IP address of your Unraid server in the controller_host and worker_host variables. Finally port-forward tcp/9699 at your router.

Config.Name: appdata
Config.Description: Holds app data for the container. Not for temp plotting or final plot storage.

Config.Name: plots
Config.Description: Holds completed Chia plots for farming.

Config.Name: plotting
Config.Description: Your fast temp space for plotting, ideally a cache pool or unassigned SSD.

Config.Name: plots_dir
Config.Description: A colon-separated list of all in-container folders holding your completed plots.

Config.Name: controller_host
Config.Description: The IP address of your Unraid server on your LAN.

Config.Name: worker_host
Config.Description: The IP address of your Unraid server on your LAN.

Config.Name: mode
Config.Description: Determines which services Machinaris starts. Default is fullnode. Others: plotter, harvester, farmer, harvester+plotter, and farmer+plotter.

Config.Name: blockchains
Config.Description: The blockchain to farm. Leave set to 'chives'.
